issue.title: [CF 775] Groups Not Showing after 743 update
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Subsequently, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type (icon, group, or profile), and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THE ABOVE INSTRUCTIONS WILL RESULT IN YOUR TICKET BEING INVALIDATED.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Load wow
2. Create groups
3. Problem happens.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

I expect to see icons for the group I made.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

743

Do you have an error log of what happened?

No error log I can see.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)


> Posted by CurseForge user fubash | Imported from CurseForge issue #775 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: FrameXML.log

FrameXML.log


> Posted by CurseForge user fubash

Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua


> Posted by CurseForge user fubash

Seems to be working fine for me. You restarted WoW after updating, right?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Yes, I've restarted my client and no icons appear when I try to enter config mode. I've also tried using version 742 and same effect. I tried with version 740 which was the version I used prior to this update and everything is normal. Any more info you need?


> Posted by CurseForge user fubash

What do you experience if you try r741?

Also, could you attach your FrameXML log to this ticket? Its located in World of Warcraft/Logs/FrameXML.txt


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

741 works, just tried 744 too and that failed.


> Posted by CurseForge user fubash

OK. Nothing unusual in your FrameXML log, which is good.

Could you attach your whole Saved Variables file? Its in World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/ACCOUNTNAME/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen.lua


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I've added my lua file, and I've also taken testing one step further by disabling all addons except for yours. I still see no icons from my previous configuration. However, I do see the bottom right corner of the resize bar when I enter configuration mode. That's about it.


> Posted by CurseForge user fubash

Give r745 a shot and see if that fixes the issue.

There was an error happening:

1x GroupModule_IconPosition_Sortable\module.lua:221: Bad argument #2 (target) to "UpdateTableManager:UpdateTable_Register(target)". !nil expected, got nil <in C code> TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-6.2.0.lua:386: in function "ValidateType" TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-6.2.0.lua:3035: in function "UpdateTable_Register" GroupModule_IconPosition_Sortable\module.lua:221: in function <GroupModule_IconPosition_Sortable\module.lua:217>


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Tested 745, and I still only see the resize icon.


> Posted by CurseForge user fubash

What group and what profile is the error happening with? Does it happen with other profiles and other groups? Does it happen with all groups and all profiles?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Yes, this error is happening across all profiles and every group in each profile.


> Posted by CurseForge user fubash

Sorry. This should all be fixed in r746.

Thank you for sticking with me on this one. Turns out there was another Lua error that was happening that only showed its face when I tried running TMW as the only addon installed/enabled.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thank you for fixing this so fast. Looks like everything is working normally as before with 746.


> Posted by CurseForge user fubash
